pages.title: Adi Kailash Yatra 2025 | Sacred Pilgrimage to Lord Shiva's Abode
pages.description: Plan your Adi Kailash & Om Parvat Yatra with expert guides. Complete packages from ₹15,000. Inner Line Permit assistance, safe transport, 25,000+ happy pilgrims. Book now!
pages.keywords: Adi Kailash yatra, Adi Kailash tour package, Om Parvat darshan, Chhota Kailash pilgrimage
pages.og_title: Adi Kailash Yatra 2025 - Sacred Himalayan Pilgrimage
pages.og_description: Experience Lord Shiva's divine abode at Adi Kailash. Complete tour packages with permits, safe transport & expert guides.

pages.title: Adi Kailash Tour Packages 2025 | 5, 9 & 14 Day Itineraries
pages.description: Choose from flexible Adi Kailash packages starting from ₹15,000. Group tours, customized itineraries, all-inclusive services. Departures from Delhi, Kathgodam & Dharchula.
pages.keywords: Adi Kailash packages, tour cost, group yatra, private tour

pages.title: How to Reach Adi Kailash | Complete Travel Guide by Air, Rail & Road
pages.description: Detailed guide to reach Adi Kailash from Delhi, Dehradun & major cities. Distance, transport options, travel time & route maps. Pantnagar Airport 301 km | Kathgodam Rail 270 km.
pages.keywords: how to reach Adi Kailash, Dharchula route, nearest airport railway

pages.title: Adi Kailash Inner Line Permit 2025 | ILP Process, Documents & Fees
pages.description: Complete guide to obtain ILP for Adi Kailash Yatra. Required documents: Aadhaar, medical certificate, photos. Apply at SDM Dharchula. Step-by-step process explained.
pages.keywords: Adi Kailash permit, Inner Line Permit, ILP Dharchula, documents required

pages.title: Best Time to Visit Adi Kailash | Weather, Season & Ideal Months
pages.description: May-June & Sep-Oct are ideal for Adi Kailash Yatra. Clear skies, 5-20°C temperature, stable weather. Avoid monsoon (Jul-Aug) & winter (Nov-Apr). Plan your trip now!
pages.keywords: best time Adi Kailash, weather, season, ideal months

pages.title: Adi Kailash Yatra Itinerary | Day-by-Day Schedule, Altitude & Attractions
pages.description: Detailed day-wise itinerary for Adi Kailash & Om Parvat Yatra. Altitude profiles, acclimatization stops, sightseeing highlights. Jolingkong Base Camp at 4,770m. View full schedule.
pages.keywords: Adi Kailash itinerary, day by day schedule, route map, altitude profile

pages.title: Adi Kailash - The Second Panch Kailash | Mythology, History & Geography
pages.description: Adi Kailash (5,945m) is Lord Shiva's sacred mountain in Pithoragarh, Uttarakhand. Known as Chhota Kailash. Learn about Panch Kailash significance, mythology & Ravana's meditation site.
pages.keywords: Adi Kailash about, Chhota Kailash, Panch Kailash, mythology, history

pages.title: Adi Kailash Yatra Cost 2025 | Package Price, Inclusions & Budget Guide
pages.description: Adi Kailash packages from ₹15,000-₹65,000 per person. Compare group vs private tours, inclusions, exclusions. Budget breakdown for 5, 9 & 14 day itineraries. Get best deals!
pages.keywords: Adi Kailash cost, yatra price, package rates, budget

pages.title: Adi Kailash Trek Preparation | Fitness, Packing List & Medical Tips
pages.description: Complete preparation guide for Adi Kailash Yatra. Physical fitness requirements, 2-3 months training, packing essentials, altitude sickness prevention. Medical certificate mandatory.
pages.keywords: Adi Kailash preparation, packing list, fitness, training, medical

pages.title: Adi Kailash Yatra FAQs 2025 | Common Questions Answered
pages.description: All your questions answered: permits, costs, difficulty, best time, age limit, safety. Plan your Adi Kailash pilgrimage with confidence. Expert advice for first-time pilgrims.
